text: Andrew Witer (born November 23, 1946) is a Canadian politician. In 1984 he became a politician in the House of Commons of Canada. == Early life == He was born in 1946, to a Ukrainian family in Leonberg, Germany. He came to Canada in his youth. ==Related pages== *People in Germany with Ukrainian ancestry Category:Canadian politicians Category:1946 births Category:Living people
title: Andrew Witer
